snippet: Novak Djokovic extended his recent mastery over Rafael Nadal with a 7-5, 7-6 (4) win in the Italian Open quarterfinals on Friday, coming from behind in both sets of a match he agreed was "a classic."...
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic extended his recent mastery over Rafael Nadal with a 7-5, 7-6 (4) win in the Italian Open quarterfinals on Friday, coming from behind in both sets of a match he agreed was "a classic."

headline.print_headline: At Italian Open, Djokovic Beats Nadal for 7th Straight Time
headline.main: At Italian Open, Djokovic Beats Nadal for 7th Straight Time
